lines.text: At wast! At wast, at wast, at wast! I got him wight where I want him!
[Bugs goes into his hole, Elmer sticks his head in]
You needn't twy to escape. I have you in my cwutches. So come out of there. Come out.
[Elmer emerges out of the hole, holding a balloon disguised as Bugs; the balloon rises up and takes Elmer with it]
You are Asweep. Asweep and helpwess.

[the hypnotized Elmer has gone into Bugs' hole]
Hey, doc! Come out of there! You can't do that! Who's the comedian in this picture, anyway?
How's about that, thinking he can hypnotize me? Ha!
Oh, I'm overdue at the airport.
[He takes off and flies like an airplane]
